similar_tickets_found.TITLE: Urgent: Cloud Access Issue
similar_tickets_found.DESCRIPTION:
Hello Team,

Please note that there is currently a Microsoft error affecting cloud re-access after being logged off or disconnected. Unfortunately, there is no available resolution time at the moment. We will keep you apprised once we receive an update.

If you are actively working in the cloud, you may continue, but please be aware that your workspace could be unstable. This means that if you're handling sensitive or collaborative documents, there is a risk that your progress might be lost. In such cases, if you encounter issues, consider shifting to non-sensitive or non-collaborative tasks.

If you are unable to access the cloud or your standard applications (e.g., RingCentral, Applied, Outlook, etc.), please log off and attempt to reconnect later in the day.

Thank you for your understanding and patience.
Thank you,
[cid:image001.png@01DB083B.A2907370]
[cid:image002.png@01DB083B.A2907370]

similar_tickets_found.TITLE: LOI Automation
similar_tickets_found.DESCRIPTION:
Hi Travis,

I just got a report that our LOI automation is not working.

Please review.  Also, please get with @support.scottsdale@teamlogicit.com<mailto:support.scottsdale@teamlogicit.com> to make sure all applicable websites are white listed so our SPAM filter doesn’t block any of these messages.

We can’t have this, and we can’t seem to get it right which is very frustrating.

@Carly Garzella<mailto:carly@garzellagroup.com> we need to have a manual follow up system after we send LOI out via phone and/or text to confirm they have received it and sent if we have not heard from them.

Please review and advise.

Best Regards,

Travis Schenck

similar_tickets_found.TITLE: RE: LOI Automation
similar_tickets_found.DESCRIPTION:
Hi Travis,

Carly needs to be added to this notification.  In addition, it needs to trigger an invoice to go out from accounting so we can send them an invoice to pay for the background check, etc.  Can we automate this invoice going out instead of having it be manual.

So effectively, it should be:

“Letter of Intent Signed”
“Invoice Sent/Received”
“Ready for Background Check & Business Plan”

In my mind this should all be automated. Carly or other representative would then review once they got the notification to make sure all is in order.  This will likely be easier once we have awareness via a Salesforce Dashboard which we are in the process of building out.

@Carly Garzella<mailto:carly@garzellagroup.com> please review.

Thanks,

similar_tickets_found.TITLE: Re: LOI Automation
similar_tickets_found.DESCRIPTION:
Dan,

I can have Carly added to that email notification no problem.

I spoke with Carly about the automatic invoice part before, and let her
know we would almost certainly need access to your QB Online to set up an
automatic invoice that's integrated with the rest of this flow. Would that
be alright with you?

As an alternative, we could set up an email notification to Jason with all
the info he'd need to generate and send an invoice. I know that's
not ideal, because it relies on someone manually doing it, but it is
another option.

Please let me know what you think.

Travis Schenck

similar_tickets_found.TITLE: Re: LOI Automation
similar_tickets_found.DESCRIPTION:
Jason,

Really, I should just need your QB Online credentials (user/email and
password).

All we would need to do is integrate your QB Online with our current
automation system, likely using a webhook, so that when an agent gets to
that specific part of the flow, they're created as a customer in QB (if not
already present) and an invoice is automatically generated and sent to them.

All of this, of course, is pending @Dan Garzella <dan@garzellagroup.com>'s
approval. I'm always mindful of us having access to financials for any
client we work with.

Travis Schenck

Subject: Re: LOI Automation

Jason,

Really, I should just need your QB Online credentials (user/email and password).

All we would need to do is integrate your QB Online with our current automation system, likely using a webhook, so that when an agent gets to that specific part of the flow, they're created as a customer in QB (if not already present) and an invoice is automatically generated and sent to them.

All of this, of course, is pending @Dan Garzella<mailto:dan@garzellagroup.com>'s approval. I'm always mindful of us having access to financials for any client we work with.

Travis Schenck

Nice to e-meet you and happy Friday in Scottsdale.

My name is Julius Frago, J.D., a Senior Executive/Personal Administrative and Project Manager Virtual Assistant from Purok 2, Liangan West, Maigo, Lanao del Norte, 9206 Philippines.

I am respectfully sending you this email to check if there is a possibility for me to be your Executive/Personal Administrative Virtual Assistant, offering you full "back office" administrative virtual assistance services.

I think that you need someone right now who understands the nuances of managing an executive's busy day, completes assigned tasks/projects, and can proactively tackle issues. As someone with a sharp eye for detail and a drive to organize, I thrive on making sure every day has a clear plan and that every plan is clearly communicated. And, most importantly, I GET THINGS DONE and MAKE SURE NOTHING FALL THROUGH THE CRACKS.

As a preliminary and for your perusal, please see the attached packet here<https://injudicious-archdeaconry.herokuapp.com/b?y=49ii4eh26opm4chj6gojiopm6lgmac1g60o32cb171j32ch25gh748hq49k78t3gect2ubr4e9kncp9ectnmuprcckn66rrd5tj6ir355ti2ucbqcgs46sjp9cpl4mi7agq54e2kb4rmeib8cln76dbd6t95ihiq9cnncqb5esvnasrg7lpmgobid5n6e8g=> containing my (1) resume, (2) Passport ID, and (3) the results of my Tony Robbins DISC and Motivators Tests.

I believe that I will do best in this role as I have been a seasoned Senior Administrative and Project Manager for fourteen (14) long years with a comprehensive background in administration, implementation, social media management, research, data entry, graphic design, and system and database management, among others; not to mention that I am an honorary graduate of two (2) full-time degrees, Juris Doctor (Law) and Bachelor of Science in Nursing.

My hourly rate ranges from $10 to $12 an hour only, working a total of 20-40 hours a week on a long-term basis.

For more information about me and the services I offer, you can visit my website here<https://injudicious-archdeaconry.herokuapp.com/b?y=49ii4eh26opm4chj6gojiopm6lgmac1g60o32cb171j32ch25gh748hq49k78t3gect2ubrac9j66rrmd5p78tb1dhgn6sr9edq62rj3ckn76pbiepkm6pbj5sh0====> or book a quick call with me using this link: calendly.com/julius-frago<https://injudicious-archdeaconry.herokuapp.com/b?y=49ii4eh26opm4chj6gojiopm6lgmac1g60o32cb171j32ch25gh748hq49k78t3g78niuor1dhimsp3cf4n66rrd5tl7ar39elpiqpjic5jmu8g=>

Would love to speak with you the soonest!


Thanks and all the best,


Julius Frago, J.D.

From: ZoomInfo Notification <noreply@email.zoominformation.com>
Sent: Friday, December 13, 2024 9:34 AM
To: Phillip Goralski <pgoralski@garzellagroup.com>
Subject: Notice of personal information processing


[ZoomInfo]<https://privacyoptout.zoominformation.com/acton/ct/46492/s-0017-2412/Bct/g-0042/l-unified-contacts:4208eb/ct0_0/1/lu?sid=TV2%3AOUZZissah>

Personal Information Notice

This Personal Information Notice is to inform you of the collection, processing, and sale of certain personal information or personal data about you ("Personal Information"). ZoomInfo collects business contact and similar information related to individuals when they are working in their professional or employment capacity, and uses this information to create professional profiles of individuals (“Professional Profiles”) and profiles of businesses (“Business Profiles”). We provide this information to our customers, who are businesses trying to reach business professionals for their own business-to-business sales, marketing, and recruiting activities.

You can opt out of our database visiting our Trust Center<https://privacyoptout.zoominformation.com/acton/ct/46492/s-0017-2412/Bct/g-0042/l-unified-contacts:4208eb/ct1_0/1/lu?sid=TV2%3AOUZZissah>. At the Trust Center, you can also submit an access request or claim your professional business profile in order to make updates to your information. Using the Trust Center is the quickest and easiest way to access your information or have it deleted or corrected. However, if you prefer to email or call us, our contact information is listed under the Who We Are section below. For additional information, please review our Privacy Policy<https://privacyoptout.zoominformation.com/acton/ct/46492/s-0017-2412/Bct/g-0042/l-unified-contacts:4208eb/ct2_0/1/lu?sid=TV2%3AOUZZissah>.

Personal Information Processed
In connection with our creation of Professional Profiles, we may collect and process any or all of the following types of Personal Information about you:

Name
Profile picture associated with your professional profile
Telephone number (general or direct business numbers, faxes, and/or mobile numbers)
Email address, including business and/or other email addresses (including “freemails” such as Gmail, Yahoo, Hotmail, etc.)
Job title and department
Office address
Company name
Work history
Education history
Professional affiliations
Links to social media profiles
Links to articles by, about, or quoting you (“web references”)
Inferences drawn from personal data in these categories

Purpose of Processing
ZoomInfo processes this information for purposes including organizing and making available Professional Profiles and Business Profiles to our customers for their direct marketing, sales, and/or recruiting activities via our products and services, or to customers who sublicense such data to their customers for any of the same purposes; testing, developing, improving, and enhancing our products and services; and for our own direct marketing, sales and recruiting purposes. Profile information is provided to our customers or partners subject to restrictive license agreements that limit the use to those specified purposes and prohibits the unauthorized use or transfer of the information.

Certain limited Personal Information in Professional Profiles may also be made publicly available in our directory pages portion of our website (“Directory Pages”). The types of Personal Information that may be made publicly available in Directory Pages include name, company, telephone number for company headquarters, office address, job title, education and work history, professional affiliations, and/or web references. Direct contact information, such as direct phone line, mobile number, or email addresses, are not provided in Directory Pages.

Lawful Basis
ZoomInfo's processing of your Personal Information is normally based on the legitimate interest of itself and its customers and partners to engage in direct marketing, sales, and recruiting activities, and ZoomInfo’s legitimate interests in organizing and making available Professional and Business Profiles, given the limited impact that this use of this business contact and similar information presents to an individual’s private life. We may also rely on other legal bases in certain situations, including for performance of a contract with you, as necessary for compliance with a legal obligation, or consent, as applicable.

Categories of Recipients
This Personal Information may be provided, subject to restrictive license agreements, to ZoomInfo's customers, its partners, or the customers of its partners. These recipients are business organizations who are permitted to use the information only for lawful sales, marketing, and recruiting purposes. The substantive terms of ZoomInfo's license agreements may be reviewed here<https://privacyoptout.zoominformation.com/acton/ct/46492/s-0017-2412/Bct/g-0042/l-unified-contacts:4208eb/ct3_0/1/lu?sid=TV2%3AOUZZissah>.

The limited Personal Information in our Directory Pages, as described above, may be provided to anyone who visits our Directory Pages on our website.

Retention Period
ZoomInfo endeavors to provide the most accurate information possible to its Customers. We seek to verify the accuracy of our information as frequently as possible and to remove information that we learn to be inaccurate. Thus, we intend to process the information we have about you for so long as it is accurate or until you instruct us to refrain from processing it.

Your Rights
You have the right to request that ZoomInfo (1) provide you with access to your Personal Information, (2) rectify or correct your Personal Information, (3) erase your Personal Information, or (4) restrict processing of your Personal Information, including refraining from selling it or otherwise providing it to any third parties. You also have the right to object to processing, to data portability, and to lodge a complaint with the appropriate supervisory authority in your country, if any. If we are processing your biometric information in connection

**Created via Incoming Email Processor**
From: Phillip Goralski <pgoralski@garzellagroup.com>
To: TeamLogic IT Service Desk <support.scottsdale@teamlogicit.com>

similar_tickets_found.TITLE: On-Prem Data Gateway for Power BI
similar_tickets_found.DESCRIPTION:
From Braden Gagner <bgagner@jentonbi.com>: Hello All,

I'm requesting that we open a new ticket to install an 'On-Premises Data Gateway' on the server (10.92.100.4) to establish scheduled refreshes from the SQL databases to the Power BI Service. Currently our only method of updating the data is to publish changes on the desktop model to the service. Installing the Data Gateway software will allow the service to connect directly to the databases which will allow scheduled refreshes and the most up-to-date data on the models/reports.

Please see the following link for documentation on downloading the software to the server:
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/data-integration/gateway/service-gateway-install

Thanks and let us know if you have any questions,

Braden Gagner
Business Intelligence Analyst, JBI
C: 602.309.6301  |  O: 480.840.7262

www.JentonBI.com<http://www.jentonbi.com/>  |  LinkedIn<https://www.linkedin.com/company/jentonbi>

**Created via Incoming Email Processor**
From: Braden Gagner <bgagner@jentonbi.com>
To: "support.scottsdale@teamlogicit.com" <support.scottsdale@teamlogicit.com>
CC: Dan Garzella <dan@garzellagroup.com>, Mike Bate <mbate@jentonbi.com>

similar_tickets_found.TITLE: Security Notice: GVC DLL Search Order Hijacking via Application Installer
similar_tickets_found.DESCRIPTION:
Sent from my iPhone

Begin forwarded message:

From: SonicWall <SecurityAdvisory@sonicwall.com>
Date: April 27, 2022 at 6:58:47 PM MST
To: Dan Garzella <dan@garzellagroup.com>
Subject: Security Notice: GVC DLL Search Order Hijacking via Application Installer
Reply-To: SonicWall <SecurityAdvisory@sonicwall.com>


CVSS: 7.7 (High) | Action Required
[SonicWall®]<https://www.sonicwall.com?utm_campaign=7015d000002R9UDAA0&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Eloqua&sfc=7015d000002R9UDAA0&ec=15228&elqTrackId=1877d00d18fa48abaa28e1e337bfb72d&elq=01b7f4d61aa74928954e69d69fe8964e&elqaid=31814&elqat=1&elqCampaignId=15228>
[READ SUPPORT ADVISORY]

SonicWall PSIRT has worked with engineering and product teams to confirm and correct three vulnerabilities associated with the SonicWall Global VPN Client (GVC), two of which impact the included client installer. Successful exploitation via a privileged user could potentially result in command execution in the target system.

IMPORTANT: There is no evidence that these vulnerabilities are being exploited in the wild. The three vulnerabilities can only be exploited after the adversary gains control of the machine, has admin privilege or is able to place malicious files on the machine.

SonicWall strongly urges that organizations using 32- and 64-bit GVC versions in their networks carefully review the knowledge base (KB) article<https://www.sonicwall.com/support/notices/220427155159727/?utm_campaign=7015d000002R9UDAA0&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Eloqua&sfc=7015d000002R9UDAA0&ec=15228&elqTrackId=8d5a3cc3bcb9433dafdd9c2bc975b6d2&elq=01b7f4d61aa74928954e69d69fe8964e&elqaid=31814&elqat=1&elqCampaignId=15228> and follow guidance for upgrade.

OVERVIEW
•       Advisory ID: SNWLID-2021-0036<https://app.message.sonicwall.com/e/er?utm_campaign=7015d000002R9UDAA0&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Eloqua&sfc=7015d000002R9UDAA0&ec=15228&s=373&lid=23519&elqTrackId=53ce5524f573431c92a2598781ac39e0&elq=01b7f4d61aa74928954e69d69fe8964e&elqaid=31814&elqat=1>
•       Product(s): SonicWall Global VPN Client (GVC)
•       Issue: GVC DLL Search Order Hijacking
•       CVSS: 7.7 (High)
•       Impacted Version(s): GVC 4.10.7.1117 and earlier (32- & 64-bit version)
•       Fixed Version(s): GVC 4.10.7.1424 (32- & 64-bit version)
•       Notes: There are different mitigation steps for 32- and 64-bit GVC versions. Please read the KB article<https://www.sonicwall.com/support/notices/220427155159727/?utm_campaign=7015d000002R9UDAA0&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Eloqua&sfc=7015d000002R9UDAA0&ec=15228&elqTrackId=ff8a14cc888b41f78c350d4c91ed22b4&elq=01b7f4d61aa74928954e69d69fe8964e&elqaid=31814&elqat=1&elqCampaignId=15228> carefully to resolve issues to your specific version.
[READ SUPPORT ADVISORY]<https://www.sonicwall.com/support/notices/220427155159727/?utm_campaign=7015d000002R9UDAA0&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Eloqua&sfc=7015d000002R9UDAA0&ec=15228&elqTrackId=36ef1d3ab9cb4562b18aae62e2c97bba&elq=01b7f4d61aa74928954e69d69fe8964e&elqaid=31814&elqat=1&elqCampaignId=15228>
IMPORTANT: Adhering to industry best practices, SonicWall does not provide support (e.g., technical support, firmware updates/upgrades, hardware replacements) for products that have reached End-of-Support (EOS) status. View the SonicWall Product Lifecycle Table<https://www.sonicwall.com/support/product-lifecycle-tables/?utm_campaign=7015d000002R9UDAA0&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Eloqua&sfc=7015d000002R9UDAA0&ec=15228&elqTrackId=182e5dbec2f342149cd2eed469506c0f&elq=01b7f4d61aa74928954e69d69fe8964e&elqaid=31814&elqat=1&elqCampaignId=15228> for more information.

similar_tickets_found.TITLE: Install EpicCloud Thin Client & Set up Users
similar_tickets_found.DESCRIPTION:
Hi TeamLogic,

In preparation for our new agency management system, we need each of our employees to have the Applied "Thin Client" installed on all of their desktops.

User Downloads Epic from Applied Community


  1.  User will log into Applied Community.
  2.  Click Production Information > Applied Epic > Download Product Updates > EpicCloud and choose ThinClient file.
  3.  After installation, user will be prompted for agency and user credentials
[Machine generated alternative text: SMART Install - Thin Client  Enter SMART user Code and Password  Enterprise ID  Usercode  Password  Next  Cancel]

  1.  User will enter agency code, credentials, and click Next.
  2.  They will choose the DEMO database.
  3.  User can explore the Epic DEMO database and begin training with Applied University.

Prior to this they need to be added as users to the management system using the attached instructions.

Please contact our implementation lead Paula Webb if you need assistance.

Paula Webb | Implementation Lead
Applied Systems, Inc.
www.appliedsystems.com<http://www.appliedsystems.com/> | pwebb@appliedsystems.com<mailto:pwebb@appliedsystems.com>

Team Logic,

Daniel J. Garzella

From: Paula Webb <PWebb@appliedsystems.com>
Sent: Friday, April 03, 2020 9:42 AM
To: Dan Garzella <dan@garzellagroup.com>; Myles Johnson <myles@garzellagroup.com>; Carly Garzella <carly@garzellagroup.com>; Kevin Conway <kevin@garzellagroup.com>; Brent Schlater <brent@garzellagroup.com>
Subject: Applied Implementation Update: Epic Server Move

[cid:image008.png@01D6099C.22CF7DE0]
Dear Team,


On the weekend of 4/11/2020, all of your Epic databases will be moved to a new Epic Cloud environment in preparation for an upgrade to Epic 2020. More details regarding the Epic 2020 upgrade will be provided over the next several weeks. Please read the following so that you understand the impact of the move taking place on the weekend of 4/11/2020.

Epic (Workstations)
All stations must be logged out of Epic during the maintenance window, which is scheduled from 9pm Central on Friday, 4/10, to 2pm Central on Sunday, 4/12.

Signing In After the Move
Within one week of the move, a user must log in to Epic on every workstation where Epic is installed in order to automatically redirect the Epic installation to point to the new server. If this does not occur, you will later need to reinstall Epic on every workstation where the redirection did not occur. The Thin Client installer for the new server will be available on the Applied Community under Product Information > Applied Epic > Download > Applied EpicCloud.

When a user logs into Epic for the first time after this move, a slightly different Epic login screen will display.  The login screen will include your Enterprise ID (GARZE01), which should be left exactly as displayed.  Type your password into the Password field and click Login.  A message will display stating that the license is invalid. The system will then automatically search for your Epic databases in our EpicCloud environments until it finds the new location.  This typically takes less than a minute, and you will just need to click OK once the message displays stating the new environment was found. The standard login screen will then be displayed and you will be able to log in to Epic as usual.

Please be sure to share the above info with all users that are impacted so they know what to expect when they log in for the first time.

It is possible you'll need to update firewall rules with the new IP addresses for your new server environment.  However, if ports 8221 and 8222 are open, you should be all set.

If you have any questions or run into any issues with this, please let me know, and I can have a member of our Support team contact you.

Sincerely,

Paula Webb | Implementation Lead
Applied Systems, Inc.
www.appliedsystems.com<http://www1.appliedsystems.com/en-us> | pwebb@appliedsystems.com<mailto:pwebb@appliedsystems.com>
P: 800-999-5368 ext.35116

similar_tickets_found.TITLE: Garzella Group - Pathway BDE Integration
similar_tickets_found.DESCRIPTION:
From Nick Cinger <nick@pathwayport.com>: Hi Jordan,

Dan from Garzella Group gave me your contact info in regards to the EPIC
BDE. Dan is looking to get their BDE data synced up with Pathway and to
accomplish this we need a few things:


   1.

   Remote SQL access to your BDE database. So we need a SQL user with
   remote read-only access created.
   2.

   We will need to know the username, password, database name of that new
   SQL user on the BDE as well as the IP(or hostname) it’s running on.
   3.

   Let me know what you’re using for the VPN and I’ll send next steps. What
   do you usually use? What device should we send a configuration for?

We want to keep this moving, so don't hesitate to reach out if you have any
questions or concerns. I'm including Nenad from our Networking Team on this
thread as well, to assist with the VPN setup and testing.

Thanks
Nick
--

Nick Cinger

 - Include attachments of the emails sent out and surveys completed

- Emails should be sent to your referral partners (perhaps a single mailbox) based on the survey responses.
- Email to customer should include both a link to the Survey (that you'll convert from the Survey Monkey survey) and the Net Promoter score options (with a Google Review link)
- Emails to be triggered using Activities

- You want to automate as much as possible, and to that end you want to:
   - Include "contact info" fields in the survey
   - information added here should automatically update in EPIC via the SDK
   - NOTE: this is not part of our current functionality, but let's keep the conversation open and see what we can do.

Nick

[https://manager.everbridge.net/c3a6abcc-0a77-4625-b989-3b81cbd30150][https://manager.everbridge.net/proxy_rtf_image/RTFImage_633f6216e262390b0b5d94f6.png]

Yealink Firmware Update

We are deploying a firmware update that will help improve the overall performance, stability, and security of your Yealink devices. Please see the schedule and additional details below.

Deployment Window:

February 19, 2023, from 11:00 PM PT to 03:00 AM PT

Highlight:

  *   Fixed bugs when connecting certain headsets to Yealink T4S phones.

Impact:

Yealink devices automatically check for new updates from the server every hour. Once the update is loaded on our database, your Yealink device will install the update when it does its hourly server check.

No active calls will be disconnected. The device will update the firmware if there are no active calls. Reboot will take place after the call. After the firmware is installed, your device is expected to work properly without any needed configuration.

To check which of your hard phones will be affected, please contact Global Support<https://support.ringcentral.com/contact-support.html>.

Actions to take:

No action is required.

Should you experience any issues after the update or have any questions, please contact Global Support<https://support.ringcentral.com/contact-support.html>.

Thank you,
RingCentral Team

Be informed!

Visit our Service Status Site<https://support.ringcentral.com/s/status?language=en_US> to be aware of any real-time issues or planned maintenance that could affect your RingCentral services.

Please do not respond to this email as the communication is a broadcast for informational purposes only and is not sent from a monitored email address.

Use the white label management app:

And you can manage admins and, if you want, install the WL app locally at your computer.

similar_tickets_found.TITLE: Requested information regarding Sharepoint usage
similar_tickets_found.DESCRIPTION: Kelvin called in with a few questions regarding his usage of Sharepoint. He advised he is looking to create a training and information database to share with other users. He was unsure if other users had access to Sharepoint and also wanted to make sure he would be able to control access to different items for different users.

new_ticket.name: vidhi
new_ticket.title: vpn issue
new_ticket.resolution_note:
1. Check your VPN connection. Make sure it is enabled and functioning properly.
2. If you're not already connected to the VPN, establish a connection now.
3. Once connected, attempt to access the database again.
4. If you still receive an "unable to connect" error message, restart your VPN client and try connecting again.
5. After reconnecting, try accessing the database once more.

If the issue persists after following these steps, please reply to the support ticket so we can further investigate the problem.

I think that you need someone right now who understands the nuances of managing an executive's busy day, completes assigned tasks/projects, and can proactively tackle issues. As someone with a sharp eye for detail and a drive to organize, I thrive on making sure every day has a clear plan and that every plan is clearly communicated. And, most importantly, I GET THINGS DONE and MAKE SURE NOTHING FALL THROUGH THE CRACKS.

As a preliminary and for your perusal, please see the attached packet here<https://injudicious-archdeaconry.herokuapp.com/b?y=49ii4eh26opm4chj6gojiopm6lgmac1g60o32cb171j32ch25gh748hq49k78t3gect2ubr4e9kncp9ectnmuprcckn66rrd5tj6ir355ti2ucbqcgs46sjp9cpl4mi7agq54e2kb4rmeib8cln76dbd6t95ihiq9cnncqb5esvnasrg7lpmgobid5n6e8g=> containing my (1) resume, (2) Passport ID, and (3) the results of my Tony Robbins DISC and Motivators Tests.

Julius Frago, J.D.

From: ZoomInfo Notification <noreply@email.zoominformation.com>
Sent: Friday, December 13, 2024 9:34 AM
To: Phillip Goralski <pgoralski@garzellagroup.com>
Subject: Notice of personal information processing


[ZoomInfo]<https://privacyoptout.zoominformation.com/acton/ct/46492/s-0017-2412/Bct/g-0042/l-unified-contacts:4208eb/ct0_0/1/lu?sid=TV2%3AOUZZissah>

Personal Information Notice

This Personal Information Notice is to inform you of the collection, processing, and sale of certain personal information or personal data about you ("Personal Information"). ZoomInfo collects business contact and similar information related to individuals when they are working in their professional or employment capacity, and uses this information to create professional profiles of individuals (“Professional Profiles”) and profiles of businesses (“Business Profiles”). We provide this information to our customers, who are businesses trying to reach business professionals for their own business-to-business sales, marketing, and recruiting activities.

You can opt out of our database visiting our Trust Center<https://privacyoptout.zoominformation.com/acton/ct/46492/s-0017-2412/Bct/g-0042/l-unified-contacts:4208eb/ct1_0/1/lu?sid=TV2%3AOUZZissah>. At the Trust Center, you can also submit an access request or claim your professional business profile in order to make updates to your information. Using the Trust Center is the quickest and easiest way to access your information or have it deleted or corrected. However, if you prefer to email or call us, our contact information is listed under the Who We Are section below. For additional information, please review our Privacy Policy<https://privacyoptout.zoominformation.com/acton/ct/46492/s-0017-2412/Bct/g-0042/l-unified-contacts:4208eb/ct2_0/1/lu?sid=TV2%3AOUZZissah>.

Personal Information Processed
In connection with our creation of Professional Profiles, we may collect and process any or all of the following types of Personal Information about you:

Name
Profile picture associated with your professional profile
Telephone number (general or direct business numbers, faxes, and/or mobile numbers)
Email address, including business and/or other email addresses (including “freemails” such as Gmail, Yahoo, Hotmail, etc.)
Job title and department
Office address
Company name
Work history
Education history
Professional affiliations
Links to social media profiles
Links to articles by, about, or quoting you (“web references”)
Inferences drawn from personal data in these categories

Purpose of Processing
ZoomInfo processes this information for purposes including organizing and making available Professional Profiles and Business Profiles to our customers for their direct marketing, sales, and/or recruiting activities via our products and services, or to customers who sublicense such data to their customers for any of the same purposes; testing, developing, improving, and enhancing our products and services; and for our own direct marketing, sales and recruiting purposes. Profile information is provided to our customers or partners subject to restrictive license agreements that limit the use to those specified purposes and prohibits the unauthorized use or transfer of the information.

Certain limited Personal Information in Professional Profiles may also be made publicly available in our directory pages portion of our website (“Directory Pages”). The types of Personal Information that may be made publicly available in Directory Pages include name, company, telephone number for company headquarters, office address, job title, education and work history, professional affiliations, and/or web references. Direct contact information, such as direct phone line, mobile number, or email addresses, are not provided in Directory Pages.

Lawful Basis
ZoomInfo's processing of your Personal Information is normally based on the legitimate interest of itself and its customers and partners to engage in direct marketing, sales, and recruiting activities, and ZoomInfo’s legitimate interests in organizing and making available Professional and Business Profiles, given the limited impact that this use of this business contact and similar information presents to an individual’s private life. We may also rely on other legal bases in certain situations, including for performance of a contract with you, as necessary for compliance with a legal obligation, or consent, as applicable.

Categories of Recipients
This Personal Information may be provided, subject to restrictive license agreements, to ZoomInfo's customers, its partners, or the customers of its partners. These recipients are business organizations who are permitted to use the information only for lawful sales, marketing, and recruiting purposes. The substantive terms of ZoomInfo's license agreements may be reviewed here<https://privacyoptout.zoominformation.com/acton/ct/46492/s-0017-2412/Bct/g-0042/l-unified-contacts:4208eb/ct3_0/1/lu?sid=TV2%3AOUZZissah>.

The limited Personal Information in our Directory Pages, as described above, may be provided to anyone who visits our Directory Pages on our website.

Retention Period
ZoomInfo endeavors to provide the most accurate information possible to its Customers. We seek to verify the accuracy of our information as frequently as possible and to remove information that we learn to be inaccurate. Thus, we intend to process the information we have about you for so long as it is accurate or until you instruct us to refrain from processing it.

Your Rights
You have the right to request that ZoomInfo (1) provide you with access to your Personal Information, (2) rectify or correct your Personal Information, (3) erase your Personal Information, or (4) restrict processing of your Personal Information, including refraining from selling it or otherwise providing it to any third parties. You also have the right to object to processing, to data portability, and to lodge a complaint with the appropriate supervisory authority in your country, if any. If we are processing your biometric information in connection

similar_tickets_found.TITLE: On-Prem Data Gateway for Power BI
similar_tickets_found.DESCRIPTION:
From Braden Gagner <bgagner@jentonbi.com>: Hello All,

I'm requesting that we open a new ticket to install an 'On-Premises Data Gateway' on the server (10.92.100.4) to establish scheduled refreshes from the SQL databases to the Power BI Service. Currently our only method of updating the data is to publish changes on the desktop model to the service. Installing the Data Gateway software will allow the service to connect directly to the databases which will allow scheduled refreshes and the most up-to-date data on the models/reports.

Please see the following link for documentation on downloading the software to the server:
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/data-integration/gateway/service-gateway-install

Thanks and let us know if you have any questions,

Braden Gagner
Business Intelligence Analyst, JBI
C: 602.309.6301  |  O: 480.840.7262

www.JentonBI.com<http://www.jentonbi.com/>  |  LinkedIn<https://www.linkedin.com/company/jentonbi>

similar_tickets_found.TITLE: Security Notice: GVC DLL Search Order Hijacking via Application Installer
similar_tickets_found.DESCRIPTION:
Sent from my iPhone

Begin forwarded message:

From: SonicWall <SecurityAdvisory@sonicwall.com>
Date: April 27, 2022 at 6:58:47 PM MST
To: Dan Garzella <dan@garzellagroup.com>
Subject: Security Notice: GVC DLL Search Order Hijacking via Application Installer
Reply-To: SonicWall <SecurityAdvisory@sonicwall.com>


CVSS: 7.7 (High) | Action Required
[SonicWall®]<https://www.sonicwall.com?utm_campaign=7015d000002R9UDAA0&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Eloqua&sfc=7015d000002R9UDAA0&ec=15228&elqTrackId=1877d00d18fa48abaa28e1e337bfb72d&elq=01b7f4d61aa74928954e69d69fe8964e&elqaid=31814&elqat=1&elqCampaignId=15228>
[READ SUPPORT ADVISORY]

SonicWall PSIRT has worked with engineering and product teams to confirm and correct three vulnerabilities associated with the SonicWall Global VPN Client (GVC), two of which impact the included client installer. Successful exploitation via a privileged user could potentially result in command execution in the target system.

IMPORTANT: There is no evidence that these vulnerabilities are being exploited in the wild. The three vulnerabilities can only be exploited after the adversary gains control of the machine, has admin privilege or is able to place malicious files on the machine.

SonicWall strongly urges that organizations using 32- and 64-bit GVC versions in their networks carefully review the knowledge base (KB) article<https://www.sonicwall.com/support/notices/220427155159727/?utm_campaign=7015d000002R9UDAA0&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Eloqua&sfc=7015d000002R9UDAA0&ec=15228&elqTrackId=8d5a3cc3bcb9433dafdd9c2bc975b6d2&elq=01b7f4d61aa74928954e69d69fe8964e&elqaid=31814&elqat=1&elqCampaignId=15228> and follow guidance for upgrade.

OVERVIEW
•       Advisory ID: SNWLID-2021-0036<https://app.message.sonicwall.com/e/er?utm_campaign=7015d000002R9UDAA0&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Eloqua&sfc=7015d000002R9UDAA0&ec=15228&s=373&lid=23519&elqTrackId=53ce5524f573431c92a2598781ac39e0&elq=01b7f4d61aa74928954e69d69fe8964e&elqaid=31814&elqat=1>
•       Product(s): SonicWall Global VPN Client (GVC)
•       Issue: GVC DLL Search Order Hijacking
•       CVSS: 7.7 (High)
•       Impacted Version(s): GVC 4.10.7.1117 and earlier (32- & 64-bit version)
•       Fixed Version(s): GVC 4.10.7.1424 (32- & 64-bit version)
•       Notes: There are different mitigation steps for 32- and 64-bit GVC versions. Please read the KB article<https://www.sonicwall.com/support/notices/220427155159727/?utm_campaign=7015d000002R9UDAA0&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Eloqua&sfc=7015d000002R9UDAA0&ec=15228&elqTrackId=ff8a14cc888b41f78c350d4c91ed22b4&elq=01b7f4d61aa74928954e69d69fe8964e&elqaid=31814&elqat=1&elqCampaignId=15228> carefully to resolve issues to your specific version.
[READ SUPPORT ADVISORY]<https://www.sonicwall.com/support/notices/220427155159727/?utm_campaign=7015d000002R9UDAA0&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Eloqua&sfc=7015d000002R9UDAA0&ec=15228&elqTrackId=36ef1d3ab9cb4562b18aae62e2c97bba&elq=01b7f4d61aa74928954e69d69fe8964e&elqaid=31814&elqat=1&elqCampaignId=15228>
IMPORTANT: Adhering to industry best practices, SonicWall does not provide support (e.g., technical support, firmware updates/upgrades, hardware replacements) for products that have reached End-of-Support (EOS) status. View the SonicWall Product Lifecycle Table<https://www.sonicwall.com/support/product-lifecycle-tables/?utm_campaign=7015d000002R9UDAA0&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Eloqua&sfc=7015d000002R9UDAA0&ec=15228&elqTrackId=182e5dbec2f342149cd2eed469506c0f&elq=01b7f4d61aa74928954e69d69fe8964e&elqaid=31814&elqat=1&elqCampaignId=15228> for more information.

similar_tickets_found.TITLE: Install EpicCloud Thin Client & Set up Users
similar_tickets_found.DESCRIPTION:
Hi TeamLogic,

In preparation for our new agency management system, we need each of our employees to have the Applied "Thin Client" installed on all of their desktops.

User Downloads Epic from Applied Community


  1.  User will log into Applied Community.
  2.  Click Production Information > Applied Epic > Download Product Updates > EpicCloud and choose ThinClient file.
  3.  After installation, user will be prompted for agency and user credentials
[Machine generated alternative text: SMART Install - Thin Client  Enter SMART user Code and Password  Enterprise ID  Usercode  Password  Next  Cancel]

  1.  User will enter agency code, credentials, and click Next.
  2.  They will choose the DEMO database.
  3.  User can explore the Epic DEMO database and begin training with Applied University.

Prior to this they need to be added as users to the management system using the attached instructions.

Please contact our implementation lead Paula Webb if you need assistance.

Paula Webb | Implementation Lead
Applied Systems, Inc.
www.appliedsystems.com<http://www.appliedsystems.com/> | pwebb@appliedsystems.com<mailto:pwebb@appliedsystems.com>
P: 800-999-5368, ext. 35116


Thanks,


Daniel J. Garzella

Team Logic,

Daniel J. Garzella

[Garzella Group_Risk Management & Consulting EMAIL SIGNATURE LOGO]

From: Paula Webb <PWebb@appliedsystems.com>
Sent: Friday, April 03, 2020 9:42 AM
To: Dan Garzella <dan@garzellagroup.com>; Myles Johnson <myles@garzellagroup.com>; Carly Garzella <carly@garzellagroup.com>; Kevin Conway <kevin@garzellagroup.com>; Brent Schlater <brent@garzellagroup.com>
Subject: Applied Implementation Update: Epic Server Move

[cid:image008.png@01D6099C.22CF7DE0]
Dear Team,


On the weekend of 4/11/2020, all of your Epic databases will be moved to a new Epic Cloud environment in preparation for an upgrade to Epic 2020. More details regarding the Epic 2020 upgrade will be provided over the next several weeks. Please read the following so that you understand the impact of the move taking place on the weekend of 4/11/2020.

Epic (Workstations)
All stations must be logged out of Epic during the maintenance window, which is scheduled from 9pm Central on Friday, 4/10, to 2pm Central on Sunday, 4/12.

Signing In After the Move
Within one week of the move, a user must log in to Epic on every workstation where Epic is installed in order to automatically redirect the Epic installation to point to the new server. If this does not occur, you will later need to reinstall Epic on every workstation where the redirection did not occur. The Thin Client installer for the new server will be available on the Applied Community under Product Information > Applied Epic > Download > Applied EpicCloud.

When a user logs into Epic for the first time after this move, a slightly different Epic login screen will display.  The login screen will include your Enterprise ID (GARZE01), which should be left exactly as displayed.  Type your password into the Password field and click Login.  A message will display stating that the license is invalid. The system will then automatically search for your Epic databases in our EpicCloud environments until it finds the new location.  This typically takes less than a minute, and you will just need to click OK once the message displays stating the new environment was found. The standard login screen will then be displayed and you will be able to log in to Epic as usual.

Please be sure to share the above info with all users that are impacted so they know what to expect when they log in for the first time.

It is possible you'll need to update firewall rules with the new IP addresses for your new server environment.  However, if ports 8221 and 8222 are open, you should be all set.

If you have any questions or run into any issues with this, please let me know, and I can have a member of our Support team contact you.

Sincerely,

Paula Webb | Implementation Lead
Applied Systems, Inc.
www.appliedsystems.com<http://www1.appliedsystems.com/en-us> | pwebb@appliedsystems.com<mailto:pwebb@appliedsystems.com>
P: 800-999-5368 ext.35116
24/7 Customer Support: 800.999.6512 | support@appliedsystems.com<mailto:support@appliedsystems.com>

similar_tickets_found.TITLE: Garzella Group - Pathway BDE Integration
similar_tickets_found.DESCRIPTION:
From Nick Cinger <nick@pathwayport.com>: Hi Jordan,

Dan from Garzella Group gave me your contact info in regards to the EPIC
BDE. Dan is looking to get their BDE data synced up with Pathway and to
accomplish this we need a few things:


   1.

   Remote SQL access to your BDE database. So we need a SQL user with
   remote read-only access created.
   2.

   We will need to know the username, password, database name of that new
   SQL user on the BDE as well as the IP(or hostname) it’s running on.
   3.

   Let me know what you’re using for the VPN and I’ll send next steps. What
   do you usually use? What device should we send a configuration for?

We want to keep this moving, so don't hesitate to reach out if you have any
questions or concerns. I'm including Nenad from our Networking Team on this
thread as well, to assist with the VPN setup and testing.

Thanks
Nick
--

Subject: RingCentral Product Update: Yealink Firmware Update 22.4.3

[https://manager.everbridge.net/c3a6abcc-0a77-4625-b989-3b81cbd30150][https://manager.everbridge.net/proxy_rtf_image/RTFImage_633f6216e262390b0b5d94f6.png]

Yealink Firmware Update

We are deploying a firmware update that will help improve the overall performance, stability, and security of your Yealink devices. Please see the schedule and additional details below.

Deployment Window:

February 19, 2023, from 11:00 PM PT to 03:00 AM PT

Highlight:

  *   Fixed bugs when connecting certain headsets to Yealink T4S phones.

Impact:

Yealink devices automatically check for new updates from the server every hour. Once the update is loaded on our database, your Yealink device will install the update when it does its hourly server check.

No active calls will be disconnected. The device will update the firmware if there are no active calls. Reboot will take place after the call. After the firmware is installed, your device is expected to work properly without any needed configuration.

To check which of your hard phones will be affected, please contact Global Support<https://support.ringcentral.com/contact-support.html>.

Actions to take:

No action is required.

Should you experience any issues after the update or have any questions, please contact Global Support<https://support.ringcentral.com/contact-support.html>.

Thank you,
RingCentral Team

Be informed!

Visit our Service Status Site<https://support.ringcentral.com/s/status?language=en_US> to be aware of any real-time issues or planned maintenance that could affect your RingCentral services.

Please do not respond to this email as the communication is a broadcast for informational purposes only and is not sent from a monitored email address.

CCEMT-COM-PRO-03015-222023

new_ticket.name: John
new_ticket.title: vpn issue
new_ticket.resolution_note:
1. Check if the VPN client software is running on your computer. If not, open the application.
2. Ensure that you have entered the correct VPN credentials (username, password, and any additional factors) to establish the connection.
3. If you are still unable to connect, try restarting your VPN client software.
4. If the issue persists, restart your computer and then attempt to connect to the VPN again.
5. Should the problem remain unresolved, please verify that your internet connection is working properly by accessing other websites or applications.
6. If your internet connection is functioning but the VPN issue persists, contact your IT support team for further assistance.

similar_tickets_found.TITLE: Urgent: Cloud Access Issue
similar_tickets_found.DESCRIPTION:
Hello Team,

Please note that there is currently a Microsoft error affecting cloud re-access after being logged off or disconnected. Unfortunately, there is no available resolution time at the moment. We will keep you apprised once we receive an update.

If you are actively working in the cloud, you may continue, but please be aware that your workspace could be unstable. This means that if you're handling sensitive or collaborative documents, there is a risk that your progress might be lost. In such cases, if you encounter issues, consider shifting to non-sensitive or non-collaborative tasks.

If you are unable to access the cloud or your standard applications (e.g., RingCentral, Applied, Outlook, etc.), please log off and attempt to reconnect later in the day.

Thank you for your understanding and patience.
Thank you,
[cid:image001.png@01DB083B.A2907370]

Please review.  Also, please get with @support.scottsdale@teamlogicit.com<mailto:support.scottsdale@teamlogicit.com> to make sure all applicable websites are white listed so our SPAM filter doesn’t block any of these messages.

similar_tickets_found.TITLE: RE: LOI Automation
similar_tickets_found.DESCRIPTION:
Hi Travis,

Carly needs to be added to this notification.  In addition, it needs to trigger an invoice to go out from accounting so we can send them an invoice to pay for the background check, etc.  Can we automate this invoice going out instead of having it be manual.

So effectively, it should be:

“Letter of Intent Signed”
“Invoice Sent/Received”
“Ready for Background Check & Business Plan”

In my mind this should all be automated. Carly or other representative would then review once they got the notification to make sure all is in order.  This will likely be easier once we have awareness via a Salesforce Dashboard which we are in the process of building out.

@Carly Garzella<mailto:carly@garzellagroup.com> please review.

Thanks,

similar_tickets_found.TITLE: Re: LOI Automation
similar_tickets_found.DESCRIPTION:
Dan,

I can have Carly added to that email notification no problem.

I spoke with Carly about the automatic invoice part before, and let her
know we would almost certainly need access to your QB Online to set up an
automatic invoice that's integrated with the rest of this flow. Would that
be alright with you?

As an alternative, we could set up an email notification to Jason with all
the info he'd need to generate and send an invoice. I know that's
not ideal, because it relies on someone manually doing it, but it is
another option.

Please let me know what you think.

Travis Schenck

>
>
>

> trigger an invoice to go out from accounting so we can send them an invoice

new_ticket.name: Shubham
new_ticket.description: When start laptop my fan is unable to start
new_ticket.title: Fan not working issue

extracted_metadata.resolution_indicators: Possible hardware issue or faulty fan

new_ticket.resolution_note:
1. Shut down your laptop properly.
2. Unplug the power cord and remove the battery if possible.
3. Wait for a few minutes to allow the system to cool down.
4. Reinsert the battery (if removed) and plug the power cord back in.
5. Try turning on your laptop to check if the fan starts.

If the fan still doesn't work, it might be a hardware issue or a faulty fan. In this case, please contact your IT support team for further assistance.

similar_tickets_found.TITLE: Urgent: Cloud Access Issue
similar_tickets_found.DESCRIPTION:
Hello Team,

Please note that there is currently a Microsoft error affecting cloud re-access after being logged off or disconnected. Unfortunately, there is no available resolution time at the moment. We will keep you apprised once we receive an update.

If you are actively working in the cloud, you may continue, but please be aware that your workspace could be unstable. This means that if you're handling sensitive or collaborative documents, there is a risk that your progress might be lost. In such cases, if you encounter issues, consider shifting to non-sensitive or non-collaborative tasks.

If you are unable to access the cloud or your standard applications (e.g., RingCentral, Applied, Outlook, etc.), please log off and attempt to reconnect later in the day.

Thank you for your understanding and patience.
Thank you,
[cid:image001.png@01DB083B.A2907370]

similar_tickets_found.DESCRIPTION:
Hi Travis,

I just got a report that our LOI automation is not working.

Please review.  Also, please get with @support.scottsdale@teamlogicit.com<mailto:support.scottsdale@teamlogicit.com> to make sure all applicable websites are white listed so our SPAM filter doesn’t block any of these messages.

We can’t have this, and we can’t seem to get it right which is very frustrating.

@Carly Garzella<mailto:carly@garzellagroup.com> we need to have a manual follow up system after we send LOI out via phone and/or text to confirm they have received it and sent if we have not heard from them.

Please review and advise.

Best Regards,

similar_tickets_found.TITLE: RE: LOI Automation
similar_tickets_found.DESCRIPTION:
Hi Travis,

Carly needs to be added to this notification.  In addition, it needs to trigger an invoice to go out from accounting so we can send them an invoice to pay for the background check, etc.  Can we automate this invoice going out instead of having it be manual.

So effectively, it should be:

“Letter of Intent Signed”
“Invoice Sent/Received”
“Ready for Background Check & Business Plan”

In my mind this should all be automated. Carly or other representative would then review once they got the notification to make sure all is in order.  This will likely be easier once we have awareness via a Salesforce Dashboard which we are in the process of building out.

@Carly Garzella<mailto:carly@garzellagroup.com> please review.

Thanks,

similar_tickets_found.TITLE: Re: LOI Automation
similar_tickets_found.DESCRIPTION:
Dan,

I can have Carly added to that email notification no problem.

I spoke with Carly about the automatic invoice part before, and let her
know we would almost certainly need access to your QB Online to set up an
automatic invoice that's integrated with the rest of this flow. Would that
be alright with you?

As an alternative, we could set up an email notification to Jason with all
the info he'd need to generate and send an invoice. I know that's
not ideal, because it relies on someone manually doing it, but it is
another option.

Please let me know what you think.

Travis Schenck

> Hi Travis,
>
>
>
> Carly needs to be added to this notification.  In addition, it needs to
> trigger an invoice to go out from accounting so we can send them an invoice
> to pay for the background check, etc.  Can we automate this invoice going
> out instead of having it be manual.
>
>
>

>
>

> order.  This will likely be easier once we have awareness via a Salesforce
> Dashboard which we are in the process of building out.

new_ticket.name: Shubham
new_ticket.title: VPN

extracted_metadata.user_actions: Trying to connect to the VPN
extracted_metadata.resolution_indicators: Check VPN settings, restart VPN client

new_ticket.resolution_note:
1. Open your VPN client on your device.
2. Go to the 'Settings' or 'Configuration' section in the VPN client.
3. Locate the 'Connection' settings within the VPN client's settings or configuration.
4. Verify that the 'VPN server address', 'username', and 'password' are correctly entered. Make sure to check for any typos or errors in these fields, as they might be causing the connection issue.
5. If you find any incorrect information, update it with the correct details and save the changes.
6. After updating the settings, try to connect to the VPN again.
7. If you are still unable to connect, close the VPN client and restart your device.
8. Once your device has restarted, open the VPN client again and try to connect.

If the problem persists after following these steps, please reply to the support ticket with an update, and we will investigate further.

similar_tickets_found.TITLE: Urgent: Cloud Access Issue
similar_tickets_found.DESCRIPTION:
Hello Team,

Please note that there is currently a Microsoft error affecting cloud re-access after being logged off or disconnected. Unfortunately, there is no available resolution time at the moment. We will keep you apprised once we receive an update.

If you are actively working in the cloud, you may continue, but please be aware that your workspace could be unstable. This means that if you're handling sensitive or collaborative documents, there is a risk that your progress might be lost. In such cases, if you encounter issues, consider shifting to non-sensitive or non-collaborative tasks.

If you are unable to access the cloud or your standard applications (e.g., RingCentral, Applied, Outlook, etc.), please log off and attempt to reconnect later in the day.

Thank you for your understanding and patience.
Thank you,
[cid:image001.png@01DB083B.A2907370]

similar_tickets_found.TITLE: LOI Automation
similar_tickets_found.DESCRIPTION:
Hi Travis,

I just got a report that our LOI automation is not working.

Please review.  Also, please get with @support.scottsdale@teamlogicit.com<mailto:support.scottsdale@teamlogicit.com> to make sure all applicable websites are white listed so our SPAM filter doesn’t block any of these messages.

We can’t have this, and we can’t seem to get it right which is very frustrating.

@Carly Garzella<mailto:carly@garzellagroup.com> we need to have a manual follow up system after we send LOI out via phone and/or text to confirm they have received it and sent if we have not heard from them.

Please review and advise.

Best Regards,

similar_tickets_found.TITLE: RE: LOI Automation
similar_tickets_found.DESCRIPTION:
Hi Travis,

Carly needs to be added to this notification.  In addition, it needs to trigger an invoice to go out from accounting so we can send them an invoice to pay for the background check, etc.  Can we automate this invoice going out instead of having it be manual.

So effectively, it should be:

“Letter of Intent Signed”
“Invoice Sent/Received”
“Ready for Background Check & Business Plan”

In my mind this should all be automated. Carly or other representative would then review once they got the notification to make sure all is in order.  This will likely be easier once we have awareness via a Salesforce Dashboard which we are in the process of building out.

@Carly Garzella<mailto:carly@garzellagroup.com> please review.

Thanks,

similar_tickets_found.TITLE: Re: LOI Automation
similar_tickets_found.DESCRIPTION:
Dan,

I can have Carly added to that email notification no problem.

I spoke with Carly about the automatic invoice part before, and let her
know we would almost certainly need access to your QB Online to set up an
automatic invoice that's integrated with the rest of this flow. Would that
be alright with you?

As an alternative, we could set up an email notification to Jason with all
the info he'd need to generate and send an invoice. I know that's
not ideal, because it relies on someone manually doing it, but it is
another option.

Please let me know what you think.

Travis Schenck

> Hi Travis,
>
>
>
> Carly needs to be added to this notification.  In addition, it needs to
> trigger an invoice to go out from accounting so we can send them an invoice
> to pay for the background check, etc.  Can we automate this invoice going
> out instead of having it be manual.
>
>
>
> So effectively, it should be:
>
>

>
> “Invoice Sent/Received”

>
>

> order.  This will likely be easier once we have awareness via a Salesforce
> Dashboard which we are in the process of building out.

>

new_ticket.name: Anant
new_ticket.description: I am getting problem in my headphone they are not working.
new_ticket.title: Hardware
new_ticket.resolution_note:
1. Check if your headphone is properly connected to the audio source. Make sure the headphone jack is inserted all the way in.
2. Try using the headphone on another device to ensure it's not a compatibility issue.
3. If you have another pair of headphones, try connecting them to the original device to rule out any issues with the audio source.
4. Gently clean the headphone jack on both the device and the headphone with a soft, dry cloth to remove any dust or debris that might be interfering with the connection.
5. If the headphone still doesn't work, try resetting the audio settings on your device. This can usually be found in the device's settings menu under "Sound" or "Audio."
6. If none of the above steps work, your headphone may be faulty. Consider getting it repaired or replaced.

similar_tickets_found.TITLE: Urgent: Cloud Access Issue
similar_tickets_found.DESCRIPTION:
Hello Team,

Please note that there is currently a Microsoft error affecting cloud re-access after being logged off or disconnected. Unfortunately, there is no available resolution time at the moment. We will keep you apprised once we receive an update.

If you are actively working in the cloud, you may continue, but please be aware that your workspace could be unstable. This means that if you're handling sensitive or collaborative documents, there is a risk that your progress might be lost. In such cases, if you encounter issues, consider shifting to non-sensitive or non-collaborative tasks.

If you are unable to access the cloud or your standard applications (e.g., RingCentral, Applied, Outlook, etc.), please log off and attempt to reconnect later in the day.

Thank you for your understanding and patience.
Thank you,
[cid:image001.png@01DB083B.A2907370]

I just got a report that our LOI automation is not working.

Please review.  Also, please get with @support.scottsdale@teamlogicit.com<mailto:support.scottsdale@teamlogicit.com> to make sure all applicable websites are white listed so our SPAM filter doesn’t block any of these messages.

@Carly Garzella<mailto:carly@garzellagroup.com> we need to have a manual follow up system after we send LOI out via phone and/or text to confirm they have received it and sent if we have not heard from them.

Dan,

If this is about Jerry Thompson, I sent an email in that other thread. Jim
got and opened the email notification for the LOI being signed.

If it helps, we can set up an automation to email Jim and/or anyone else if
these email notifications have been opened and the agent's stage hasn't
been changed within a certain time frame.

If this is about another agent, please let me know so I can investigate it.

Travis Schenck

similar_tickets_found.TITLE: RE: LOI Automation
similar_tickets_found.DESCRIPTION:
Hi Travis,

Carly needs to be added to this notification.  In addition, it needs to trigger an invoice to go out from accounting so we can send them an invoice to pay for the background check, etc.  Can we automate this invoice going out instead of having it be manual.

So effectively, it should be:

“Letter of Intent Signed”
“Invoice Sent/Received”
“Ready for Background Check & Business Plan”

In my mind this should all be automated. Carly or other representative would then review once they got the notification to make sure all is in order.  This will likely be easier once we have awareness via a Salesforce Dashboard which we are in the process of building out.

@Carly Garzella<mailto:carly@garzellagroup.com> please review.

Thanks,

similar_tickets_found.TITLE: Re: LOI Automation
similar_tickets_found.DESCRIPTION:
Dan,

I can have Carly added to that email notification no problem.

I spoke with Carly about the automatic invoice part before, and let her
know we would almost certainly need access to your QB Online to set up an
automatic invoice that's integrated with the rest of this flow. Would that
be alright with you?

As an alternative, we could set up an email notification to Jason with all
the info he'd need to generate and send an invoice. I know that's
not ideal, because it relies on someone manually doing it, but it is
another option.

Please let me know what you think.

Travis Schenck

new_ticket.name: Anant Lad
new_ticket.title: Can not connect to database due to network issue.

extracted_metadata.main_issue: Can not connect to database due to network issue.
extracted_metadata.resolution_indicators: Network connectivity issue, database connection troubleshooting

new_ticket.resolution_note:
1. Check if your system is connected to the internet. You can do this by opening a web browser and trying to visit a well-known website, such as www.google.com.
2. If you cannot access the internet, restart your network device (modem or router) by unplugging it, waiting for 30 seconds, and then plugging it back in. Wait for it to fully reconnect before attempting to access the database again.
3. If you are able to access the internet, try restarting your database application. This can often resolve temporary connectivity issues.
4. If the problem persists, verify that you are using the correct database server address and credentials (username and password). Make sure there are no typos or errors in the connection string.
5. If you are still unable to connect to the database, contact your IT support team and provide them with the error messages and any other relevant details. They may need to further investigate the network issue or consult with the database administrator to ensure the database is properly configured and available for connections.

similar_tickets_found.TITLE: Urgent: Cloud Access Issue
similar_tickets_found.DESCRIPTION:
Hello Team,

Please note that there is currently a Microsoft error affecting cloud re-access after being logged off or disconnected. Unfortunately, there is no available resolution time at the moment. We will keep you apprised once we receive an update.

If you are actively working in the cloud, you may continue, but please be aware that your workspace could be unstable. This means that if you're handling sensitive or collaborative documents, there is a risk that your progress might be lost. In such cases, if you encounter issues, consider shifting to non-sensitive or non-collaborative tasks.

If you are unable to access the cloud or your standard applications (e.g., RingCentral, Applied, Outlook, etc.), please log off and attempt to reconnect later in the day.

Thank you for your understanding and patience.
Thank you,
[cid:image001.png@01DB083B.A2907370]

similar_tickets_found.DESCRIPTION:
Hi Travis,

I just got a report that our LOI automation is not working.

Please review.  Also, please get with @support.scottsdale@teamlogicit.com<mailto:support.scottsdale@teamlogicit.com> to make sure all applicable websites are white listed so our SPAM filter doesn’t block any of these messages.

We can’t have this, and we can’t seem to get it right which is very frustrating.

@Carly Garzella<mailto:carly@garzellagroup.com> we need to have a manual follow up system after we send LOI out via phone and/or text to confirm they have received it and sent if we have not heard from them.

Please review and advise.

Best Regards,

similar_tickets_found.TITLE: RE: LOI Automation
similar_tickets_found.DESCRIPTION:
Hi Travis,

Carly needs to be added to this notification.  In addition, it needs to trigger an invoice to go out from accounting so we can send them an invoice to pay for the background check, etc.  Can we automate this invoice going out instead of having it be manual.

So effectively, it should be:

“Letter of Intent Signed”
“Invoice Sent/Received”
“Ready for Background Check & Business Plan”

In my mind this should all be automated. Carly or other representative would then review once they got the notification to make sure all is in order.  This will likely be easier once we have awareness via a Salesforce Dashboard which we are in the process of building out.

@Carly Garzella<mailto:carly@garzellagroup.com> please review.

Thanks,

Dan,

I can have Carly added to that email notification no problem.

I spoke with Carly about the automatic invoice part before, and let her
know we would almost certainly need access to your QB Online to set up an
automatic invoice that's integrated with the rest of this flow. Would that
be alright with you?

the info he'd need to generate and send an invoice. I know that's
not ideal, because it relies on someone manually doing it, but it is
another option.

Please let me know what you think.

Travis Schenck

new_ticket.name: Anant Lad
new_ticket.description:
Outlook is not working properly, after 5 minutes it is
closing automatically solve these issue today only.
new_ticket.title: Software issue

extracted_metadata.resolution_indicators: Possible fix: resolve software issue or configuration problem

new_ticket.resolution_note:
1. Close Outlook completely if it's currently open.
2. Press the Windows key and type "Control Panel", then click on the Control Panel app.
3. In the Control Panel, set the "View by" option to "Small icons".
4. Click on "Mail (Microsoft Outlook)".
5. In the Mail Setup - Outlook dialog box, click on the "Show Profiles" button.
6. If there are multiple profiles listed, make sure the correct one is selected. If not, select the appropriate profile.
7. Click on the "Properties" button.
8. Go to the "General" tab and click on the "Email Accounts" button.
9. In the Email Accounts dialog box, select the account with issues and click on the "Change" button.
10. Make sure the correct server (POP3 or IMAP) is selected and click on the "More Settings" button.
11. Go to the "Advanced" tab and ensure that the "Deliver new messages to" option is set to the correct mailbox. Also, check if the "Incoming server (POP3)" and "Outgoing server (SMTP)" ports are set correctly (usually 995 for POP3 and 465 for SMTP).
12. Click "OK" to close all dialog boxes and restart Outlook.

If the issue persists, try the following:

13. Press the Windows key and type "regedit", then click on the Registry Editor app.
14. Navigate to the following path: `HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Microsoft\Office\<version>\Outlook\AutoDiscover` (replace `<version>` with your Office version, e.g., 16.0).
15. If the `AutoDiscover` key does not exist, you can create it by right-clicking on `Outlook`, selecting "New" > "Key", and then naming it "AutoDiscover".
16. Right-click on the right side of the window, select "New" > "DWORD (32-bit) Value", and name it "ExcludeScpLookup".
17. Set the value of "ExcludeScpLookup" to 1 by double-clicking on it and entering 1 in the "Value data" field.
18. Click "OK" and close the Registry Editor.
19. Restart Outlook.

If Outlook still closes automatically after 5 minutes, contact IT support with the ticket number and describe the steps you've taken.

similar_tickets_found.TITLE: Urgent: Cloud Access Issue
similar_tickets_found.DESCRIPTION:
Hello Team,

Please note that there is currently a Microsoft error affecting cloud re-access after being logged off or disconnected. Unfortunately, there is no available resolution time at the moment. We will keep you apprised once we receive an update.

If you are actively working in the cloud, you may continue, but please be aware that your workspace could be unstable. This means that if you're handling sensitive or collaborative documents, there is a risk that your progress might be lost. In such cases, if you encounter issues, consider shifting to non-sensitive or non-collaborative tasks.

If you are unable to access the cloud or your standard applications (e.g., RingCentral, Applied, Outlook, etc.), please log off and attempt to reconnect later in the day.

Thank you for your understanding and patience.
Thank you,
[cid:image001.png@01DB083B.A2907370]

Please review.  Also, please get with @support.scottsdale@teamlogicit.com<mailto:support.scottsdale@teamlogicit.com> to make sure all applicable websites are white listed so our SPAM filter doesn’t block any of these messages.

similar_tickets_found.TITLE: RE: LOI Automation
similar_tickets_found.DESCRIPTION:
Hi Travis,

Carly needs to be added to this notification.  In addition, it needs to trigger an invoice to go out from accounting so we can send them an invoice to pay for the background check, etc.  Can we automate this invoice going out instead of having it be manual.

So effectively, it should be:

“Letter of Intent Signed”
“Invoice Sent/Received”
“Ready for Background Check & Business Plan”

In my mind this should all be automated. Carly or other representative would then review once they got the notification to make sure all is in order.  This will likely be easier once we have awareness via a Salesforce Dashboard which we are in the process of building out.

@Carly Garzella<mailto:carly@garzellagroup.com> please review.

Thanks,

similar_tickets_found.TITLE: Re: LOI Automation
similar_tickets_found.DESCRIPTION:
Dan,

I can have Carly added to that email notification no problem.

I spoke with Carly about the automatic invoice part before, and let her
know we would almost certainly need access to your QB Online to set up an
automatic invoice that's integrated with the rest of this flow. Would that
be alright with you?

As an alternative, we could set up an email notification to Jason with all
the info he'd need to generate and send an invoice. I know that's
not ideal, because it relies on someone manually doing it, but it is
another option.

Please let me know what you think.

Travis Schenck

>
>
>

> trigger an invoice to go out from accounting so we can send them an invoice

new_ticket.name: Rohan Kulkarni
new_ticket.description:
Hello,
This is a reminder to complete the documentation within the next 5 days.
Thanks,
Team Lead
new_ticket.title: Reminder: Task Pending
new_ticket.resolution_note:
1. Create a task or reminder in your preferred digital note-taking app or calendar.
2. Label the task as "Complete Documentation."
3. Set a due date and time that is reasonable for you to complete the documentation process.
4. Add any relevant details or notes to the task, such as specific sections of the documentation that need attention.
5. Set the task to remind you at regular intervals, such as daily or weekly, until the documentation is complete.
6. When the reminder appears, pause your current task and focus on completing the documentation.
7. Once the documentation is complete, mark the task as done in your app or calendar.

similar_tickets_found.TITLE: Urgent: Cloud Access Issue
similar_tickets_found.DESCRIPTION:
Hello Team,

Please note that there is currently a Microsoft error affecting cloud re-access after being logged off or disconnected. Unfortunately, there is no available resolution time at the moment. We will keep you apprised once we receive an update.

If you are actively working in the cloud, you may continue, but please be aware that your workspace could be unstable. This means that if you're handling sensitive or collaborative documents, there is a risk that your progress might be lost. In such cases, if you encounter issues, consider shifting to non-sensitive or non-collaborative tasks.

If you are unable to access the cloud or your standard applications (e.g., RingCentral, Applied, Outlook, etc.), please log off and attempt to reconnect later in the day.

Thank you for your understanding and patience.
Thank you,
[cid:image001.png@01DB083B.A2907370]

I just got a report that our LOI automation is not working.

Please review.  Also, please get with @support.scottsdale@teamlogicit.com<mailto:support.scottsdale@teamlogicit.com> to make sure all applicable websites are white listed so our SPAM filter doesn’t block any of these messages.

Please review and advise.

Best Regards,

similar_tickets_found.TITLE: RE: LOI Automation
similar_tickets_found.DESCRIPTION:
Hi Travis,

Carly needs to be added to this notification.  In addition, it needs to trigger an invoice to go out from accounting so we can send them an invoice to pay for the background check, etc.  Can we automate this invoice going out instead of having it be manual.

So effectively, it should be:

“Letter of Intent Signed”
“Invoice Sent/Received”
“Ready for Background Check & Business Plan”

In my mind this should all be automated. Carly or other representative would then review once they got the notification to make sure all is in order.  This will likely be easier once we have awareness via a Salesforce Dashboard which we are in the process of building out.

@Carly Garzella<mailto:carly@garzellagroup.com> please review.

Thanks,

similar_tickets_found.TITLE: Re: LOI Automation
similar_tickets_found.DESCRIPTION:
Dan,

I can have Carly added to that email notification no problem.

I spoke with Carly about the automatic invoice part before, and let her
know we would almost certainly need access to your QB Online to set up an
automatic invoice that's integrated with the rest of this flow. Would that
be alright with you?

As an alternative, we could set up an email notification to Jason with all
the info he'd need to generate and send an invoice. I know that's
not ideal, because it relies on someone manually doing it, but it is
another option.

Please let me know what you think.

Travis Schenck

> Hi Travis,
>
>
>
> Carly needs to be added to this notification.  In addition, it needs to
> trigger an invoice to go out from accounting so we can send them an invoice
> to pay for the background check, etc.  Can we automate this invoice going
> out instead of having it be manual.
>
>
>

>
>

> order.  This will likely be easier once we have awareness via a Salesforce
> Dashboard which we are in the process of building out.

new_ticket.name: Rohan Kulkarni
new_ticket.description:
Let’s catch up sometime next week. No deadline on this, just whenever
convenient.
Cheers,
Manager
new_ticket.title: Team Catch-up

extracted_metadata.affected_system: None (no system or application is affected)
extracted_metadata.resolution_indicators: No specific resolution approach or common fix mentioned

new_ticket.resolution_note:
1. Schedule a team catch-up by finding a suitable time for all team members to meet.
2. Choose an appropriate communication platform for the catch-up, such as a video conferencing tool or a group chat application.
3. Create a meeting invite or event in the chosen platform, including the date, time, and agenda.
4. Share the meeting invite or event details with all team members, ensuring they have the necessary link or dial-in information.
5. During the catch-up, encourage open communication and active participation from all team members.
6. Address any issues or topics on the agenda, and make sure everyone has a chance to contribute.
7. After the catch-up, send a follow-up message to all participants, summarizing the discussion and any action items decided upon.

new_ticket.name: Rohan Kulkarni
new_ticket.description:
The review must be done *after 2-7-2025 and before 4-7-2025*. Please
confirm your availability.
Regards,
Compliance Officer
new_ticket.title: Schedule Compliance Review
new_ticket.resolution_note:
1. Check your schedule to confirm your availability for the Compliance Review.
2. Identify potential time slots that work for you in the upcoming days.
3. Reply to the IT support ticket with your confirmed availability.
4. In your response, include the specific days and times you are available for the Compliance Review.

Please note that this resolution focuses on confirming your availability for the review, as instructed by the metadata. Once your availability is confirmed, further steps may be provided to address any additional issues related to the Compliance Review system.

similar_tickets_found.TITLE: Urgent: Cloud Access Issue
similar_tickets_found.DESCRIPTION:
Hello Team,

Please note that there is currently a Microsoft error affecting cloud re-access after being logged off or disconnected. Unfortunately, there is no available resolution time at the moment. We will keep you apprised once we receive an update.

If you are actively working in the cloud, you may continue, but please be aware that your workspace could be unstable. This means that if you're handling sensitive or collaborative documents, there is a risk that your progress might be lost. In such cases, if you encounter issues, consider shifting to non-sensitive or non-collaborative tasks.

If you are unable to access the cloud or your standard applications (e.g., RingCentral, Applied, Outlook, etc.), please log off and attempt to reconnect later in the day.

Thank you for your understanding and patience.
Thank you,
[cid:image001.png@01DB083B.A2907370]
